page.title: 13FAMILY LIFE
page.content: My name is Louise Dawson, and my family and I live on a{boat}on {Dewsbury Canal Basin.} It's quite a good life just{pottering}up and down. The{Calder}and{Hebble}Canal was made over one hundred years ago and was used for moving{cargo}about. Before {engines}were made they used{horses}to pull the old coal{barges,}but now the canals are used for{pleasure.} I was 10 years old when I moved onto a boat and I found it really{different from our{house}in{Leeds.} We first moved on to a{narrow boat}which was like living in a{corridor}but the best thing was that we could just go on holiday when we felt like it. Then we moved onto an{ex-Naval Tender}which we have built by ourselves.
